name: PleaseHold
summary: Quick and easy progress UIView to place in your app.
description: In the moments when you need to show a blocking progress UIView in your app, PleaseHold is a quick way to put one in your app. Configured with default settings that will work for most use cases, but customizable enough to cover more. Do us all a favor, and avoid blocking views ðŸ˜‰.
